org.pentaho.dm.kf
Interface GroovyHelper

All Known Implementing Classes:
GroovyComponent
public interface GroovyHelper

Helper interface that allows Groovy scripts to call back to the GroovyComponent to manage event notifications.

Version:
$Revision $
Author:
Mark Hall (mhall{[at]}pentaho{[dot]}com)
